item.description:
Lucca (http:www.luccaboston.com), named after a town in Tuscany, serves superb Northern Italian cuisine. Our holiday banquet will have a fixed price of $55. That includes 3 food courses: Appetizer-Bibb salad, prosciutto or squash and apple bisque, Entree-Rigatoni Bolognese, gnocchi, roasted chicken breast or pan-roasted salmon, Dessert-tiramisu or bread pudding. It also includes either red wine-2004 Saniovese/Canaiolo/Montepulciano or white wine-2010 Soave Classico. Tax and tip are also included. What it does not include is a pre-dinner drink or any drinks during the meal that aren't either of the 2 wines listed above.

Please have cash of $55 up front, as we won't be getting a bill. My credit card will be charged automatically. The restaurant is located on the first block of Hanover Street on the left side as you're coming from the Greenway. Haymarket (Green & Orange lines) is the nearest T-stop and the Parcel 7 Garage (136 Blackstone St.-entrance on Sudbury St.) is the best place to park. The restaurant also has valet parking. For those who arrive before 7:00, join us downstairs for a cocktail hour and mingling.

It's extremely important to attend if you've signed up, or cancel by noon the day before. It will be a festive evening in the North End. Please try to join us.
item.name: Lucca-Holiday Banquet
